attributes.action: Pay everyone not working because of Coronavirus an income that they can rely on
attributes.additional_details: We need to lock down the UK to shorten the period the virus holds us at ransom I am in the vunerable bracket looking for work since the company employing me via an agency laid me off 20 March 2020 saying the one week's notice will be paid I was one of around180
attributes.background: Take away the fear of self isolating by giving a fixed income instead of the lottery the government has introduced..

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
